title: WTT Johnson, Young, Mcgraw Hindu others for Cobb
author: Jcosta19

posts.post_title: WTT Johnson, Young, Mcgraw Hindu others for Cobb
posts.post_content:
Want to trade some of these for or toward a new Cobb for my collection. 

Ideally looking for t205 lower grade but would consider any Cobbs or low grade Gehrig or Ruth cards.

T206 Walter Johnson Portrait PSA 1mk

T206 Cy Young Bare Hand SGC 1 

T206 Mcgraw Portrait no Cap Hindu back SGC 1.5

1933 Sport Kings Ty Cobb PSA 1

Not for sale at this time. Will add cash if needed
PM if any interest. Thanks

[IMG]https://uploads.tapatalk-cdn.com/20210504/58694385eca16f3d1b44fb1b93832c69.jpg[/IMG][IMG]https://uploads.tapatalk-cdn.com/20210504/86ccd5368d2a57c6fef09cdc4f8de177.jpg[/IMG][IMG]https://uploads.tapatalk-cdn.com/20210504/c8477430a6285c74244a68ba7c065328.jpg[/IMG][IMG]https://uploads.tapatalk-cdn.com/20210504/777d22011212570b62278da24e259bd0.jpg[/IMG][IMG]https://uploads.tapatalk-cdn.com/20210504/56b43a1386081ee77d2e93e984e6b37b.jpg[/IMG][IMG]https://uploads.tapatalk-cdn.com/20210504/6883f3ec8cb2154b4aaadd61990f94b3.jpg[/IMG][IMG]https://uploads.tapatalk-cdn.com/20210504/2e5b0f81d2b7f879a3dbe578d7931d77.jpg[/IMG][IMG]https://uploads.tapatalk-cdn.com/20210504/7bd5158799cc50db5423ecc325877dc7.jpg[/IMG]

Sent from my SM-G960U using Tapatalk

I've had a few good conversations but no deals yet.

Would also take a decent Matty white cap in trade or Lajoie batting (any off backs even better)

Some cash either way is fine depending on the deal. 

Sent from my SM-G960U using Tapatalk
